Docs.summary: This class provides the logic for deriving the names of various items within the manifest from the code. It is used by framework components when names are not specified in the API and the framework types have to default it to a meaningful name derived from the service type.

Docs.summary: Gets the default endpoint resource name for the given service type
Docs.returns: The name of the endpoint resource.

list.item: If the type name is IMyService, this method returns MyServiceEndpoint as the name of the endpoint resource.
If the type name is Foo, this method returns FooServiceEndpoint as the name of the endpoint resource.
